# Node.js dependencies (if you use Node.js scripts)
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Environment variables and secrets
.env
.env.*

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini

# VS Code settings
.vscode/
.history/

# MongoDB data dumps and local databases
*.dump
*.bak
*.log

# Logs
logs/
*.log

# Compiled output (if any)
dist/
build/

# Miscellaneous
*.swp
*.swo
